home.title:
Hi! I'm
Andrew Gonzalez
, a dedicated IT engineer, passionated developer, and the Front-End Lead at work.
home.more: I am passionate about crafting experiences through code and unleashing my creativity. I also enjoy video games and food.

about.title: About me
about.description1: I am Andrew, a software developer from Mexico City 🇲🇽, These days, I focus on improving at Elixir 💧 language, enrich my portfolio and creating courses from which other people can learn.
about.description2: Over the past 8+ years, I've worked in various areas of software development, including front-end , back end and mobile. I'm proud to have worn many hats.
